name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select

the Attack command.

<Timed Attack: arrows>
Command Amount: 3
Randomize Commands: left, right, left
Frames: 90
<End Timed Attack>

<Bypass Cooldown>
<setup action>
clear battle log
hide battle hud
change switch 6: off
display action
immortal: targets, true
perform start
wait for movement
</setup action>

<whole action>

</whole action>

<target action>
camera screen: point, 400, 220, 20
zoom: 200%, 20
move user: backward, 120, 20
move target: backward, 120, 20
wait for movement
zoom: 175%, 80
shake screen: 3, 3, 60
motion swing: user
action animation
wait: 10
action effect
shake screen: 1, 1, 60
move user: forward, 30, 60
move target: forward, 30, 60
wait for movement
death break
</target action>

<follow action>
</follow action>

<finish action>
immortal: targets, false
wait for new line
clear battle log
move target: home, 20
move user: home, 20
perform finish
wait for movement
wait for effect
if target.isActor()
show battle hud
change switch 6: on
end
action common event
</finish action>

description:
The user sweeps aggressively before 
bonking their opponent with the broom. (Chance to crit)
name: Sweep
note:
<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>

<Timed Attack: arrows>
Command Amount: 4
Randomize Commands: true
Frames: 120
<End Timed Attack>

<Bypass Cooldown>

clear battle log
change switch 6: off

immortal: targets, true
perform start
wait for movement

wait for movement

timed attack
shake screen: 3, 3, 60
motion swing: user
action animation
wait: 10
action effect
shake screen: 1, 1, 60
move user: forward, 30, 60
move target: forward, 30, 60
wait for movement
death break
</target action>

<follow action>
</follow action>

<finish action>
immortal: targets, false
wait for new line
clear battle log
move target: home, 20
move user: home, 20
perform finish
wait for movement
wait for effect
if target.isActor()
show battle hud
change switch 6: on
end
action common event
</finish action>

description:
Chucks a heap of candy at the opponent.
Has a chance to stun!
name: Throw Candy
